description: GET request that returns reward slot holders
title: BurnchainRewardSlotHolderListResponse

limit.description: The number of items to return

offset.description: The number of items to skip (starting at `0`)

items.title: BurnchainRewardSlotHolder
items.description: Reward slot holder on the burnchain

canonical.description: Set to `true` if block corresponds to the canonical burchchain tip

burn_block_hash.description: The hash representing the burnchain block

address.description: The recipient address that validly received PoX commitments, in the format native to the burnchain (e.g. B58 encoded for Bitcoin)

slot_index.description: The index position of the reward entry, useful for ordering when there's more than one slot per burnchain block
